data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: When the question is about the advantages and disadvantages of being a professional athlete, I think there are some pros and cons. Firstly, being professional athletes can help them earn a reputation in their own countries and they are more likely to earn a lot of money because of the reputation. Secondly, being professional athletes and getting gold medals in international competitions can help these athletes to serve their country. However, I should also point out that being a professional sportsman may hurt their physical health during exercises or competitions, which is the main disadvantage of being a professional athlete.
data.referenceText: What are some of the advantages and disadvantages of being a professional athlete?
data.referenceTranslate: 成为职业运动员的优点和缺点是什么?
